60  inline void NumSet(Gwen::Controls::Base* ctrl, const Gwen::String& str, float f)
61  {
62  for (int i = 0; i < NumCount(); i++)
63  {
64  if (NumName(i) == str)
65  NumSet(ctrl, i, f);
66  }
67  }

152 #define GWEN_CONTROL_FACTORY_CONSTRUCTOR(ThisName, BaseName) \
153  typedef BaseName BaseClass; \
154  typedef ThisName ThisClass; \
155  ThisName() : BaseClass()
156 
157 #define GWEN_CONTROL_FACTORY(ThisName) \
158  void GWENCONTROLFACTORY##ThisName() \
159  { \
160  new ThisName(); \
161  }
162 
163 #define DECLARE_GWEN_CONTROL_FACTORY(ThisName) \
164  extern void GWENCONTROLFACTORY##ThisName(); \
165  GWENCONTROLFACTORY##ThisName();

169  Gwen::String Name() { return #_name_; } \
